text: Bhankharpur is a census town in Mohali district in the state of Punjab, India. ==Demographics== India census, Bhankharpur had a population of 9118. Males constitute 54% of the population and females 46%. Bhankharpur has an average literacy rate of 71%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 74% and female literacy of 67%. 13% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar district
title: Bhankharpur
